author: Jeff
title: The hero this city needs (7 Gifs)
text:
1 GIF 
Patrolling the streets of Montreal this past week was one caped crusader that no one should fear. That is because inside the suits were none other than business partners Julien Bauby and Mehdi Bennai Smires who upon seeing their city engulfed by an attack from Mr. Freeze, sprung to action and retook the streets for Montrealâ€™s citizens. 
They helped old ladies cross the road. 2
